page.title: 17A Day in my Life (2)
page.content: It is Saturday.I wake up at 9 a.m.Mum & Dad make breakfast,I read my comic called "WHOOPEE!" While I eat my breakfast of Kelloggs Â£Country Store' I watch cartoons on the portable television. After breakfast I have a pillow fight with my brother.The family then go to Sudbury shopping which is followed by a game of cricket with some friends. For lunch we have new potatoes,lamb, carrots and peas followed by watching the afternoon film.After tea we finish our homework and watch a video until 10 pm.Tomorrow we go to visit our Nan in Romford.
